name: Vayne
title: the Night Hunter
shortBio: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when slaying practitioners or creations of the dark arts, striking from the shadows with a flurry of silver bolts.

skins.name: Aristocrat Vayne
skins.description: Vayne never imagined slaying monsters would bring her fame and fortune. Now that she has them, she finds it terribly difficult to return to a life when her crossbow and arrows weren't made from pure gold.

skins.name: Dragonslayer Vayne
skins.description: Many heeded the call of the dragonslayers as they mustered their forces, from common cutpurses to fabled monster hunters. Vayne was one such legendary recruitâ€”for what is a dragon, if not the deadliest beast of all?

skins.name: Heartseeker Vayne
skins.description: Take a tumble with Heartseeker Vayne, the season of romance's number one exterminator of supernatural horrors! With her trusty crossbow, iron will, and years of brutal training, she'll make sure no heart will ever escape her grasp.

skins.name: SKT T1 Vayne
skins.description: Honoring Piglet's winning performance as Vayne during the 2013 World Championship.

skins.name: Arclight Vayne
skins.description: Empowered by the Arclight, the slayer Vayne was shown the creeping darkness lurking beneath the foundations of the world. Tasked to fight it back at all costs, she will stop at nothing to drive each new horror from whence it came.

skins.name: Soulstealer Vayne
skins.description: Once a hunter of all things tainted, Vayne has become the very thing she sought to destroy. Her twisted mind warps her perception, causing her to see an enemy in every living thing. She takes souls with impunity, with no stain of these vile deeds upon her conscience.

skins.name: PROJECT: Vayne
skins.description: Augmented with classified tech, Vayne was once a member of PROJECT's counter-espionage unit. After she was betrayed by the corporation she served, she now stalks the shadows as a vigilante, searching for ways to break PROJECT and the technology that haunts her soul.

skins.name: Firecracker Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Lunar Revel event.

skins.description: Vayne has donned her finest Lunar Revel garb in her endless quest to root out evil everywhere, including citywide celebrations. One would assume it's better not to spend holidays around a grown woman shooting firecrackers out of a metal wrist-pig, but it's been that kind of year.

skins.name: Prestige Firecracker Vayne
skins.description: Vayne has donned her even finer Lunar Revel garb, noting the growing anxiety around her explosive-shooting metal wrist-pig. Fashion upgrades solve all problems.

skins.name: Spirit Blossom Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

skins.description: Vayne came from a lost clan of monster hunters, annihilated to the last when the primordial demon of pain chanced upon their hidden village. Unable to let go, and doomed to her own obsessions for eternity, she hunts the creature without end, always unable to catch it.

skins.name: FPX Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Honoring LWX's winning performance as Vayne during the 2019 World Championship with the help of Lil'Black, Lil'Orange, Firmiana and Lil'White.

skins.name: Sentinel Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Sentinels event.

skins.description: Ever striving to become a better monster hunter, Vayne joins the Sentinels primarily to advance her own arsenal and learn from their battle with the Black Mist. It doesn't hurt that she is also defending Runeterra from evil, of course. If she must endure the friendship of a fool like Graves to do so, she will. The cause is worth it.

skins.name: Battle Bat Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Anima Squad event.

skins.description: Vayne is Anima Squad's premiere intel expert, infiltrating enemy strongholds to strike first, strike fast, and strike hard. She's willing to do anything it takes to ensure humanity's survival, even if sometimes that means butting heads with the leadership of Commander Fortune.

skins.name: Prestige Firecracker Vayne (2022)
skins.description: Vayne has donned her even finer Lunar Revel garb, noting the growing anxiety around her explosive-shooting metal wrist-pig. Fashion upgrades solve all problems.

skins.name: Dawnbringer Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: An overconfident god keen to show her potential to the Dawnbringers, Vayne ruthlessly hunts the Nightbringers out of her deep fear of the gods' foretold destruction. So violent are her actions that she undermines herself by leaving even more chaos in her wake. Still, she hopes killing Jarvan will be enough to cement her standing within the light.

skins.name: Dragonmancer Vayne

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Vayne vowed to hunt the blazing, rotting forces that arose from Brand's destruction. She never faltered, even when cornered on a remote coast, where she fought to the brink of death. By fate, her narrow victory coincided with the turn of a new night, and the Midnight Dragon came down to imbue her spirit with blessed darkness, sharp as draconic scales.

passive.name: Night Hunter
passive.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 45 Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

spells.name: Tumble
spells.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals an additional @ADRatioBonus@ physical damage on her next Attack.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Silver Bolts
spells.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.
spells.dynamicDescription: <spellPassive>Passive</spellPassive>: Every third consecutive Attack or Ability against an enemy deals an additional <trueDamage>@TotalDamage@ max Health true damage</trueDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Condemn
spells.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
spells.dynamicDescription: Vayne fires a bolt that <status>Knocks Back</status> and deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>. If the target collides with terrain, they take <physicalDamage>@EmpoweredDamageTT@ bonus physical damage</physicalDamage> and become <status>Stunned</status> for @StunDuration@ seconds. @SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Final Hour
spells.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter
spells.dynamicDescription: Vayne gains <physicalDamage>@BonusAttackDamage@ Attack Damage</physicalDamage> for @BaseDuration@ seconds, extended by @DurationToAdd@ seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within @DamagedMarkerDuration@ seconds. Additionally, during the duration:<li><spellName>Night Hunter</spellName> instead grants <speed>@MovementSpeed@ Move Speed</speed>.<li>The Cooldown of <spellName>Tumble</spellName> is reduced by @TumbleCDReduction@%, and grants <keywordStealth>Invisibility</keywordStealth> for @TumbleStealthDuration@ second.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
